name: Ana
description: Former second in command of Overwatch, Ana Amari uses her skills and expertise to defend her home and the people she cares for.

name: Ashe
description: Ashe is the ambitious and calculating leader of the Deadlock Rebels Gang and a respected figure in the criminal underworld.

name: Baptiste
description: An elite combat medic and ex-Talon operative, Baptiste now uses his skills to help those whose lives have been impacted by war.

name: Bastion
description: Once a frontline combatant in the Omnic Crisis, this curious Bastion unit now explores the world, fascinated by nature but wary of a fearful humanity

name: Brigitte
description: No longer sitting on the sidelines, Brigitte Lindholm has taken up arms to defend those in need of protection.

name: Cassidy
description: Armed with his Peacekeeper revolver, the outlaw Cole Cassidy doles out justice on his own terms.
base_of_operations: anta Fe, New Mexico, USA (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar (currently)

name: D.Va
description: D.Va is a former professional gamer who now uses her skills to pilot a state-of-the-art mech in defense of her homeland.
base_of_operations: MEKA Base, Busan, South Korea (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar (currently)

name: Doomfist
description: Doomfist is the calculating leader of Talon, a terrorist organization and paramilitary force that works in direct opposition to Overwatch.

name: Echo
description: Echo is a multirole, adaptive robot with the most sophisticated artificial intelligence in the world, originally designed by Dr. Mina Liao for use during combat missions with Overwatch.

name: Genji
description: The cyborg ninja Genji Shimada has made peace with the augmented body he once rejected, and in doing so, he has discovered a higher humanity.
base_of_operations: Hanamura, Japan (formerly), Shambali Monastery, Nepal (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar (currently)

name: Hanzo
description: Mastering his skills as a bowman and an assassin, Hanzo Shimada strives to prove himself as a warrior without peer.

name: Illari
description: As the last of the Inti Warriors, Illari is a vessel for the power of the sun. She’ll do anything to make up for her past.

name: Junker Queen
description: Armed with her axe, Carnage, and her electromagnetic gauntlet, the cutthroat leader of the Junkers is on a mission to rule the world.

name: Junkrat
description: Junkrat is an explosives-obsessed Junker who lives to cause chaos and destruction.

name: Kiriko
description: As Miko of the Kanezaka shrine and daughter of the Shimada's former swordmaster, Kiriko Kamori channels both her spiritual and ninja skills to heal her fractured city.

name: Lifeweaver
description: The brilliant creator of biolight, a technology that merges plant matter and hard light. He dreams of healing the world.

name: Lucio
description: Lúcio is an international celebrity and musician who inspires social change through his music and actions.

name: Mei
description: Mei is a scientist who has taken the fight to preserve the environment into her own hands.

name: Mercy
description: A guardian angel to those who come under her care, Mercy is a peerless healer, a brilliant scientist, and a staunch advocate for peace

name: Moira
description: Equal parts brilliant and controversial, Talon scientist Moira O'Deorain is on the cutting edge of genetic engineering, searching for a way to rewrite the fundamental building blocks of life.

name: Orisa
description: Built from parts of one of Numbani's short-lived OR15 defense robots, Orisa is the city's newest protector, through she still has much to learn.

name: Pharah
description: Fareeha Amari's commitment to duty runs in her blood. She comes from a long line of highly decorated soldiers and burns with the desire to serve with honor.

name: Ramattra
description: The brutal leader of Null Sector will stop at nothing to see his vision for the world realized.

name: Reaper
description: Some speak of a black-robed terrorist known only as the Reaper. His identity and motives are a mystery. What is known is that where he appears, death follows.

name: Reinhardt
description: Reinhardt Wilhelm styles himself as a champion of a bygone age, who lives by the knightly codes of valor, justice, and courage

name: Roadhog
description: Roadhog is a powerful enforcer with a well-earned reputation for random and wanton destruction.

name: Sigma
description: Brilliant astrophysicist Siebren de Kuiper gained the ability to control gravity when an experiment went terribly wrong. Now, Talon manipultes him to their own ends.
base_of_operations: The Hague, Netherlands (formerly), International Space Station (formerly)

name: Sojourn
description: As a leader in the bygone days of Overwatch, Vivian Chase, callsign Sojourn, is determined to ensure its new heroes don’t repeat the mistakes of the past.

name: Soldier: 76
description: The target of an international manhunt, the vigilante known as Soldier: 76 wages a personal war to expose the truth behind Overwatch's collapse.

name: Sombra
description: One of the world's most notorious hackers, Sombra uses information to maniuplate those in power.

name: Symmetra
description: Symmetra literally bends reality. By manipulating hard-light constructs, she crafts the world as she wishes it to be, in hopes of engineering a perfect society.

name: Torbjörn
description: At its height, Overwatch possessed one of the most advanced armaments on the planet, which could be traced to the workshop of an ingenious engineer named Torbjörn Lindholm.

name: Tracer
description: The former Overwatch agent known as Tracer is a time-jumping adventurer and an irrepressible force for good.

name: Widowmaker
description: Widowmaker is the perfect assassin: a patient, ruthlessly efficient killer who shows neither emotion nor remorse.

name: Winston
description: A super-intelligent, genetically engineered gorilla, Winston is a brilliant scientist and a champion for humanity's potential

name: Wrecking Ball
description: A resourceful and highly intelligent mechanic and fighter, Wrecking Ball rose from the laboratories of Horizon Lunar Colony to become the Junker Queen’s champion.

name: Zarya
description: Aleksandra Zaryanova is one of the world's strongest women, a celebrated athlete who sacrificed personal glory to protect her family, friends, and country in a time of war.
base_of_operations: Krasnoyarsk Front (formerly), Novoanskoye Forward Base, Siberia, Russia (formerly), Watchpoint: Gibraltar (currently)

name: Zenyatta
description: Zenyatta is an omnic monk who wanders the world in search of spiritual enlightenment. It is said that those who cross his path are never the same again.
